Articles.Content:
This is a repository for FAR aircraft that seem to defy conventional wisdom as to what an airplane should be like. Show us pictures or videos of crafts that will amaze us by the very fact that they work at all in FAR. Then explain how they actually work BETTER than conventional planes in some ways.

.craft files are not required, but are strongly encouraged.

P.S. You can post modded craft if you like, just remember that not everyone will be able to use them.

I'll start with my Stingray high-performance twin-engine fighter.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

.craft

More

Javascript is disabled. View full album

VL-110EF "Spearhead": High performance compact blended-wing FAR SSTO fighter.

VL-110EA "Arrowtip.": High performance compact blended-wing FAR fighter jet.

A hint on the Arrowtip. Get rid of 6 of the intakes so that there are only 2 and also use the new tweakables to get rid of the 1.1 tonnes of oxidizer. It lowers the craft mass to 7.85 tonnes and also makes it capable of controlled flight at a continuous 49-degree AoA.

Edited January 19, 2014 by Pds314
